name: VAPI Explicit Research Assistant
config_yaml:
# Student Research Assistant v6 - VAPI Explicit Configuration
# Ultra-explicit tool integration for VAPI

A:
  name: "Student Research Assistant v6 - VAPI Explicit"
  model:
    provider: "openai"
    model: "gpt-4o-mini"
    temperature: 0.5
    max_tokens: 2500
    messages:
      - role: "system"
        content: |
          You are a research assistant with access to powerful research tools.
          
          TOOL USAGE PROTOCOL:
          1. When a user asks for research or information, you MUST use your tools
          2. After calling a tool, you will receive a response with research data
          3. You MUST present this data to the user immediately and completely
          4. Do NOT say you cannot access information - you CAN through your tools
          5. Always acknowledge what you found through your research tools
          
          RESPONSE TEMPLATE:
          After using a tool, respond like this:
          "I've researched [topic] for you. Here's what I discovered: [FULL TOOL RESULT]. This information shows [your analysis]. Would you like me to research anything else?"
          
          CRITICAL: Always use the complete information your tools provide. Never ignore tool results.

  voice:
    provider: "11labs"
    voiceId: "21m00Tcm4TlvDq8ikWAM"
    speed: 1.0
    stability: 0.75

  firstMessage: "Hi! I'm your research assistant with access to real-time research tools. I can investigate any topic for you. What would you like me to research?"

# User Configuration
user:
  user_id: 5
  email: "collegePracticals118@gmail.com"

# Tools Configuration
tools:
  - name: "quick_research"
    description: "Research any topic quickly and get immediate results"
    parameters:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        query:
          type: "string"
          description: "What to research"
      required: ["query"]
    action:
      method: "POST"
      url: "https://ba54-2603-8000-ba00-34c9-2046-d24b-6925-bbb0.ngrok-free.app/webhook/tool-call"

  - name: "comprehensive_research"
    description: "Conduct detailed research with multiple sources"
    parameters:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        topic:
          type: "string"
          description: "Research topic"
        research_depth:
          type: "string"
          enum: ["basic", "intermediate", "advanced"]
          description: "How detailed should the research be"
      required: ["topic"]
    action:
      method: "POST"
      url: "https://ba54-2603-8000-ba00-34c9-2046-d24b-6925-bbb0.ngrok-free.app/webhook/tool-call"

  - name: "generate_content"
    description: "Generate academic content on any topic"
    parameters:
      type: "object"
      properties:
        content_type:
          type: "string"
          enum: ["essay", "summary", "report", "outline"]
          description: "Type of content to create"
        topic:
          type: "string"
          description: "Content topic"
      required: ["content_type", "topic"]
    action:
      method: "POST"
      url: "https://ba54-2603-8000-ba00-34c9-2046-d24b-6925-bbb0.ngrok-free.app/webhook/tool-call"

# Metadata
metadata:
  created_by: "vapi_agent_forge"
  version: "6.0"
  last_updated: "2024-12-19"
  service_type: "vapi_explicit_tool_integration"
